abstract: The energy producer AES agreed to acquire DPL, the parent company of Dayton Power & Light, as industry consolidation continues.
snippet: The energy producer AES agreed to acquire DPL, the parent company of Dayton Power & Light, as industry consolidation continues.
lead_paragraph: 2:29 p.m. | Updated The energy producer AES said on Wednesday that it had agreed to acquire DPL, the parent company of the utility Dayton Power & Light, for $3.5 billion in cash.

headline.main: AES to Buy Ohio Utility for $3.5 Billion
